title: Islamic Library  (Maktabah Shamelah)
description:
This is the official release of the popular Islamic software: Maktabah Shamelah (Version 3.48). Consists of approx 6800 on various subjects of Islamic theology.

**Note**: Your OS should support the display and typing of Arabic language. If the Arabic is not diplayed properly then try setting up the system locale to Arabic in regional and language settings in control panel.



Description and Features

1) A library containing an initial amount of 6800 books on the various Islaamic sciences [only Arabic] organized into appropriate categories and identity cards for many of the books and authors

4) Ability to change background image of the application, and changing the font and color of various levels of text and background in the software (e.g. main text, comments, titles, footnotes, etc.)

Just download, extract with 7zip and run the setup.
